# novaverse

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This metapackage combines all the Nova Institute's R packages into a tidyverse-style library for ease of use and programming.

## Installation

Install from github with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("NovaInstitute/novaverse")
```
